law.catch_line: On or before January 1, 2008, and on or before January 1 of each subsequent year, the Board shall r...
law.text: On or before January 1, 2008, and on or before January 1 of each subsequent year, the Board shall report to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, to the General Assembly on the implementation of this subtitle.
